wikipedia_page.main: Valentine Maher (17 May 1780 – January 1844) was an Irish Whig politician.Maher was first elected Whig MP for Tipperary at the 1841 general election and held the seat until his death in 1844, when his cousin Nicholas Maher took over the seat.He was a member of Arthur's and a magistrate for County Tipperary.

response: Nicholas Valentine Maher (died 18 October 1851) was an Irish Repeal Association politician.
Maher was first elected Repeal Association MP for  at a by-election in 1844—caused by the death of his cousin, Valentine Maher—and held the seat until his own death in 1851.
